title: Canon PIXMA MegaTank G3012 Multi-function WiFi Color Inkjet Printer (Color Page Cost: 0.21 Rs. | Black Page Cost: 0.09 Rs. | Borderless Printing)  (Black, Ink Tank, 2 Ink Bottles Included)
description: Bring home this Canon G3012 Multi-function Wireless Color Printer that features High Page Yield Ink Bottles and an Integrated Ink Tank System and enjoy printing up to 7000 pages. This printer can be linked to your smartphone via the One-Touch Direct Wireless Connection function. The ink bottle tips are designed to prevent spills during the refilling process.

high_lights: Cost per Page (Black): 0.09 Rs. | Cost per Page (Color): 0.21 Rs.
Print Speed Mono A4: 8.8 ipm | Print Speed Color A4: 5 ipm
